src.name: 企业基本登记信息
src.sql: select a.*,rownum pyorder from(select swdjzh,mc from czy_dj order by NLSSORT(mc,'NLS_SORT=SCHINESE_PINYIN_M'))a

select b.sxmc,b.sxbm,r.sxz,'' btys,'' ys from ( select to_char(djxh) djxh,mkbm,sxbm,sxz from DHCX_SX union all select djxh,'104' mkbm,sxbm,sxz from DHCX_DJ union all select djxh,'201' mkbm,sxbm,to_char(sxz) from DHCX_sr union all select djxh,'301' mkbm,case when sxbm='BNRK' then 'SNZZ' when sxbm='SNRK' then 'QNZZ' when sxbm='QNRK' then 'DQNZZ' ELSE NULL end sxbm,to_char(sxz) from DHCX_sr ) r,bm_sx b where r.mkbm=b.mkbm and r.sxbm=b.sxbm and r.mkbm={menuid} and r.djxh={swdjzh}
select sxbm,sxmc,width,align from BM_SX where mkbm={menuid}
